name: places/ChIJU3Bvew1ZwokRfbeSiHr0QXQ
formattedAddress: 22 W 66th St, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 22 W 66th St, New York, NY 10023-6207, USA

originalText.text: I love consignment store shopping. On a recent trip to New York (the week of October 2) a friend recommended this shop to me.   From the moment my friend and I walked  in, the owner Tonya greeted us with a smile and explained how items are arranged in the store. She was so helpful and   She has a great selection of high end designer clothes , shoes and bags as well as mid tier designer items and some many vintage pieces.  You have to give yourself time to shop here.  Everything is well organized and the place is full of treasures.  I bought a snakeskin evening bag, a pair of boots and a  beautiful animal print sweater by All Saints .I wore the sweater to dinner the same night and received sooo many complements.    I love this shop!!!! And I’m so glad to have found it . Will definitely visit again when I’m back in the city.  Do yourself a favor and make plans to experience this large and beautiful shop of great items !

originalText.text:
I’ve had a wonderful experience scoring some great finds at the shop!

CPR offers quality and affordable merchandise in Manhattan! The store provides high end consignment, resale and thrift all under one roof. Even a section spotlighting local designers work.
Whether you’re shopping for apparel, jewelry or original artwork, you’ll find it there.

It is beautifully decorated and so stylish. The staff are very welcoming, helpful and the owner is just a wonderful woman all around.

There are other consignment stores throughout the boroughs but Central Park Resale is by far my favorite in every way!

originalText.text:
What a wonderful shopping experience I had at Park Central resale. I had gone to numerous other shops with no success but as soon as I walked into this store I found 5 pieces that I was ecstatic over. It being my birthday, I bought them all!!  The salesperson Tanya was so helpful without being overbearing and turned out to be the owner.
I cannot stand perfumes, cleaners or musty clothing so I couldn’t believe how clean everything was. The clothes were so fresh without any horrible laundry or old perfume smell on them.
I give this thrift/resale shop a solid 10/10. You can see by the photos how ecstatic I was. I ran out onto the street and had my husband do photos of my new pieces!!!

originalText.text: My sisters and I thrift all over the city, and this is one of the very best places. Very well organized, fair prices, and some wonderful unexpected finds - on top of which Tanya, the owner, is the bomb.

text.text: My sisters and I thrift all over the city, and this is one of the very best places. Very well organized, fair prices, and some wonderful unexpected finds - on top of which Tanya, the owner, is the bomb.

originalText.text:
Great store, amazing inventory.
You'll find wonderful unique vintage pieces. The store owner Tanya is so nice and helpful, definitely the best spot for thrifts in NYC. I will definitely be back.
